about_the_game:
Welcome to beautiful Kazera!


The Vermillion Empire has lead humanity to war with the magical Kazaki for decades. The Starknight, Razizal, has held off Vermillion's advances for hundreds of years, but the Empire has prepared a masterstroke to turn the tides for good.

Kazak is a turn based RPG inspired by 90s video games and anime with a soundtrack to match. Gameplay has an emphasis on exploration, platforming and shooting and providing a unique experience with each playthrough with a multitude of play styles in mind. Battles are turn based and involve QTEs for dodging attacks and using powerful skills and techniques.


Features:
  • Six playable characters
  • Choose your own level paths
  • Battle QTEs to avoid damage/gain advantage
  • Equip up to 4 battle skills per party member
  • Level up skills to gain new effects
  • Unique bosses, enemies, items and dialogue for each path
  • Multiple endings
  • New Game +
  • Retro styled art
  • Chiptune music by Homie Boon

content_descriptors.notes: Swearing/Strong Language.  Implied acts of genocide.  Religious symbolism.

short_description: In this retro inspired turn-based RPG, customize your battle skills, test your reflexes and blast your way through hostile environments. With multiple level routes, story paths, endings and more, no two playthroughs will be alike.
